title: Amazon Considers Disclaimer to Antisemitic Film Irving Shared Online
description: The company said it was working with the Anti-Defamation League to potentially add language to the page that viewers see before buying or renting the film.
dc:creator: Karen Weise
category: Hebrews to Negroes: Wake Up Black America (Movie)
media:description: Kyrie Irving, the Nets superstar basketball player, posted a link more than a week ago to an antisemitic documentary on Amazon.
